page.title: 07The Nelson connection
page.content: One of the famous people in our area was Countess Nelson.The name Nelson started from Horatio,Lord Nelson who won the battle of Trafalgar. Horatio,Lord Nelson had no legitimate children.Nelsons sister married Thomas Bolton.By an act of parliament they could take the name of Earl Nelson.Their son ThomasNelson married Francis Elizabeth Eyre in 1821.She became Countess Francis Elizabeth Nelson.Countess Nelson owned Landford Lodge and Landford Manor.Countess Nelson gave a piece of church yard, the rectory and the school grounds. She also gave Â£1000 to build the new church.Countess Nelson lived in the manor for 17 years,and was a widow for 43 years.The Nelson family has been in Landford since 1797.Countess Nelson was born on the March 1st and her mother died on 8th.
